text: Said Inspectors shall be respectively required to make, at least once in 2 weeks, a report to said Director of the Department of Human Services, in writing, of their inspections, which shall be preserved on file.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 6-104.

1973 Ed., § 6-105.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-191 validated a previously made technical correction.

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-191, see notes following § 7-103.

Miscellaneous Notes

Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.

DC CODE § 7-104

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
